law.text: No action taken by the commissioner nor proceeding commenced, nor right accrued, nor violation of law existing under any act repealed by this chapter, is affected by the repeal, but all procedure hereafter taken in reference thereto shall conform to this code as far as possible.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 912, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 1, sec. 18, effective June 18, 1970.
